meanings.definition: Something that is not a problem.
meanings.sent1: Finding a parking spot was a nonproblem today.
meanings.sent2: The easy math question was a nonproblem for the students.
meanings.sent3: The nonproblem of choosing which ice cream flavor to get made them smile.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude turned every obstacle into a nonproblem.
meanings.sent5: The clear instructions made the task a nonproblem to complete.

meanings.definition: A situation that does not present difficulties or challenges.
meanings.sent1: The picnic in the park was a nonproblem to organize.
meanings.sent2: The nonproblem of having extra time allowed them to relax.
meanings.sent3: Their nonproblem with finding a good movie to watch was a relief.
meanings.sent4: The smooth journey made the travel a nonproblem for them.
meanings.sent5: The well-prepared team made the competition a nonproblem to win.
